server.model

Class Hangman

  • java.lang.Object
    • server.model.Hangman

  • public class Hangman
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is only for handling the game. The rules, words, and other stuff is defined here. The controller class calls its methods. It throws exceptions to be handled by controller.
    See Also:
    Controller

    • Constructor Detail

      • Hangman

        public Hangman(java.lang.String wfp)
        throws java.io.IOException
        This constructor is initiating variables and words. We choose MAX_WORDS randomly from the file.
        Parameters:
        wfp - The complete path to the file containing the refrence words for the hangmant game. Every line, 1 word.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - It will be sent in case of file location problem.
        java.io.IOException - It will be sent in case of out of bound (bigger than 0) afa parameter.

      • startGame

        public void startGame()
               throws java.lang.Exception
        Runs the game by initiating word, chosen word, and remainingFailedAttempts.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - In case of worng status invoking or IOException in case of file problems.

      • guess

        public void guess(java.lang.String inp)
           throws java.lang.Exception
        If the client makes a guess on a char, then server looks into the chosen word and replaces the free places with the guessed char. in a successful try, remainingFailedAttempts wont change. If the client makes a guess on a word, server checks that and in a successful one game status will change to finished.
        Parameters:
        inp - What client guessed.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - In case of worng status invoking

      • finishGame

        public void finishGame()
                throws java.lang.Exception
        Finish the game, the scores will be 0 and no words selected. (file is still onboard)
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - in case of wrong command

      • readRandomWord

        public java.lang.String readRandomWord()
                                throws java.io.IOException
        Reads through the file and selects a word randomly.
        Returns:
        Selected random word
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - in case of file not found
